name: VOEOL
description:
-----(PVE,PVP)-----
'Vengeance On Evil Online' is a side-scroll ARPG featuring traditional Chinese art style. Inspired by Monster Hunter, we've also created a weapon/equipment forging system in which you can create more than a hundred different weapons and equipments.
In the beautiful world of 'Vengeance On Evil Online', you will play as a young warrior who have just finished his training and begin his journey of fighting monsters and demons to bring back peace for different villages.
